basics.name: Prachi Goyal
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: A Software Engineer with a specialization in API development, deep learning, and systems optimization. Proven experience in building large-scale systems and research in federated learning.

work.name: Microsoft
work.summary: Building impactful APIs for Microsoft Graph Teams, specializing in meetings, teams, and channels. Developed a CI/CD pipeline for a Business Intelligence data pipeline.
highlights: Specialization in API development and DevOps
Built APIs for Microsoft Graph Teams
Developed a CI/CD pipeline for Business Intelligence
On-call for large-scale systems, reliability, and optimization

work.name: Microsoft
work.summary: Worked on ECS flighting system for Audio, Signal and MediaTA under OneDrive SharePoint.
highlights: Implemented ECS flighting system for Signals
Developed private preview tasks for specific tenants

work.name: Atletik Games
work.summary: Developed Android games based on deep learning for Physical Education during Covid-19 lockdown.
highlights: Integrated state-of-the-art pose and object detection models
Deployed games to 3 schools with 500+ students

education.institution: Indraprastha Institute of Information and Technology Delhi (IIITD)

awards.title: Women Techmakers Engineering Fellow Scholarship
awards.summary: Selected among 120 scholars from over 15,000 applicants across India.

publications.name: Importance Sampling Based Federated Unsupervised Representation Learning
publications.summary: Published work on a novel FL algorithm for unsupervised and personalized representation learning.

projects.name: Intersection Problem in Highway-Env (Multi-Agent Deep Reinforcement Learning)
projects.description: Designed and implemented multi-agent deep reinforcement learning models for safe intersection handling in complex highway environments.
highlights: Trained multiple agents using Double Q Network
Enhanced performance metrics through reward tuning

projects.name: Image-to-Image Translation (Deep Learning)
projects.description: Implemented models for Reverse Semantic Segmentation and Super Resolution tasks using state-of-the-art architectures.
highlights: Applied Pix2Pix, pSp encoder, and SRGAN models
Tuned models for high-quality outputs with fast convergence

projects.name: Color Switch Game (JavaFX Game Development)
projects.description: Developed an interactive color-switching game using JavaFX.
highlights: Applied OOP principles for efficient gameplay mechanics
Implemented detailed class structures and UI diagrams

projects.name: Linux Shell (Systems Programming in C)
projects.description: Designed a custom shell to execute Linux commands using system calls and standard C libraries.
highlights: Implemented command parsing for multiple commands and arguments
